scripts.cloud:dev: cd cloud && bun i && bun run dev
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:typescript && bun run typecheck:python && bun run typecheck:cloud
scripts.test:python: cd python && uv run pytest tests/
scripts.ci: bun run lint && bun run coverage:python
scripts.lint: bun run codespell && bun run lint:python && bun run lint:typescript && bun run lint:cloud
scripts.lint:python: cd python && uv sync --all-extras --dev && uv run ruff check . && uv run pyright .
scripts.lint:typescript: cd typescript && bun i && bun run lint
scripts.lint:cloud: cd cloud && bun i && bun run lint
scripts.fix: bun run fix:python && bun run fix:typescript && bun run fix:cloud
scripts.fix:python: cd python && bun run scripts/regenerate_examples.ts && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.generate:python-sdk:gen-ai-types: cd python && uv run datamodel-codegen --input schemas/gen-ai --output mirascope/ops/_internal/instrumentation/llm/gen_ai_types
scripts.fix:typescript: cd typescript && bun i && bun run fix
scripts.fix:cloud: cd cloud && bun i && bun run fix
scripts.cloud:python-sdk:generate: cd cloud && bun run generate:openapi > ../fern/openapi.json && cd ../fern && npx fern generate --group python-sdk --local --force && bun run fix:python
